titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duties on cefuroxime axetil (bulk and dosage forms).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 11/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on 1-(acetyloxy) ethyl ester of (6R, 7R)-3-carbamoyl-oxymethyl- 7-(Z-2-methoxyimino-2-(fur-2-yl) acetamido) ceph-3-em-4-carboxylate (cefuroxime axetil in bulk and dosage forms).
